CatDescriptText: Mr. Harvey Sanders, 2713 Webster Avenue, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 30, 1958, pg. 3, with question: "Do you think that Negroes make full use of their voting franchise by registering and voting in both the primary and the general election?" Answer reads: "Our people do not do it. They should take advantage of their franchise.  We would be much better off if they did.  We would have better jobs and be more respectable."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Harvey Sanders wearing light colored t-shirt and cap, standing at corner of brick building with signs inscribed "...k here ...locker Co. Inc." and "...use elev..."
